meanings.definition: To treat or coat with a substance to prevent rust.
meanings.sent1: Dad rustproofs the metal gate every year to keep it shiny.
meanings.sent2: It is important to rustproof your car to protect it from corrosion.
meanings.sent3: The wizard rustproofs his magical staff to ensure it stays gleaming.
meanings.sent4: She rustproofs her heart with positivity to avoid emotional decay.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut rustproofs his spacesuit before the mission to Mars.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment that prevents rust.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic applied rustproofs to the underside of the vehicle.
meanings.sent2: You can buy rustproofs at the hardware store for your tools.
meanings.sent3: The detective's secret weapon against rust was a special batch of rustproofs.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter acted as rustproofs against the dullness of the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The ancient treasure chest was preserved by magical rustproofs.
